messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] was: Red heads and Is It Normal?, now genetics, adop...
messages.messageBody:
>From: tinkiechelle1@...

<< (snip) come to find out her dad and my husband are cousins.
small world your story reminded me of this and thought i'd share.>>

Funny story. We have a six degrees of separation thing between my daughter
and my husband. Turns out that my husband's sister was married to a guy who
was best friends with my daughter's father's sister's 1st husband! Did you
follow that one?

Thing is my husband and I were together for years before finding out. It was
my daughter's 8th grade graduation dinner and our chosen table consisted of
myself and my husband, my SIL, her ex husband, and my ex husband. My now SIL
also knows my ex SIL and one thing led to another and BAM, the connection!!
It was too funny as I knew my ex SIL's 1st husband too. My husband and I
were a lot closer way back when then we realized!!!!

Mary B

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] was: Red heads and Is It Normal?, now genetics, adop...
messages.msgSnippet: my daughter and husband are alot alike too. he has raised her for many years, after we had been married awhile people kept telling me how much she looked like
messages.messageBody:
my daughter and husband are alot alike too. he has raised her for many years,
after we had been married awhile people kept telling me how much she looked
like my husband and come to find out her dad and my husband are cousins.
small world your story reminded me of this and thought i'd share.
tina


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
